page.title: 11ECONOMICS
page.content: {ECONOMICS.}Nowadays very few people are paid in cash.Most people have cheque books and credit cards.To use a cheque you must have a bankers card to support it.Credit cards like Access and Visa allow you to buy goods and pay later.The Post Office pays out Pensions and Allowances.You can have a Savings Account and also use the Giro like a bank.Many people including children use banks for saving money. You put money into an Investment Account and get paid Interest on that money.There are two Banks in Coggeshall,Barclays and Natwest.They also lend people money.To buy your own house you have to borrow money.People either get a bank loan or a mortgage from a Building Society.There are only sub-branches of Building Societies in other peoples offices.
